divs: Sighting DetailsWas up briefly, looked out the window, and saw an object moving laterally and diagnolly ever 15 seconds or so. Lights went from blue to white to red. It was not close, it was about the size of a large planet as far as relative size to me. It hovered and moved for at least an hour.It was definitely not a plane or helicopter or blimp. The sky was as clear as I've ever seen; you could see so many stars. There was zero light pollution. My wife saw it as well Has anyone else reported this?
Summary: object with changing lights overing then moving
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around October 19th 2009
